title: Democrats say America’s role as a scientific leader is slipping, while Republicans remain unworried
description: Among Americans, trust in science increased slightly between 2024 and 2025, according to a new Pew Research poll.
content: Among Americans, trust in science increased slightly between 2024 and 2025, according to a new Pew Research poll.
